document.full_text: russian hacker attacks on the country's biggest blog site and a spy agency's warning to gmail and skype have raised fears that authorities are tightening their grip on dissent in a china-like assault on free speech.
document.title: analysis: russian internet attacks stifle political dissent
lines_and_colors: russian hacker attacks on the country's biggest blog site and a spy agency's warning to gmail and skype have raised fears that authorities are tightening their grip on dissent in a china-like assault on free speech.
